description:
Am I the first one to use this app. Though I will be using R on Ubuntu for first time 

Hope this goes as expected. will review rating after 1month of use.
I am a Data Science student and the R programming language is one of the best languages you can use in this area, along with Python.
summary: Powerful programming language, especially for Data Scientists

description:
R is a powerful statistical software although it does have a steep learning curve. Online instructions to install R and R-Studio are easy, and works flawlessly. 
I have docked a star because you will have to install the curl package which requires the installation of patches in the main Linux Terminal. Although online instructions are available, it was a bit confusing the first time I encountered the error.
What about the update to R 3.6.0? I think it's important!!
summary: Great App, therefore it haw to be updateted to 3.6.0 version

description: Great app and great environment to use statistic, data, transform data
summary: Great app and great environment to use statistic, data, transform data

description: Poor icon, everywhere, impossible to learn in a reasonable manner of time, barrier to entry in many job markets, learned and advocated by abusive people in the professional industry, the list goes on and on. Do not associate with this piece of "magic" unless you really actually need and want to. Oh also: It's very hard to uninstall once it's infected your machine, so watch out.
O melhor para estatística
There are a lot of problems in installing packages which are of 3.6 version. and 3.6 version is not available for ubuntu 18.4
Very poor written programming language.

As a programming language: performance-wise is very poor and without any innovation (boring), and it is very hard to find a decent package. Those few good packages are mostly c or fortran library and have an interface here. The functions names are stupid most of the time, ....
Very powerful statistical software

Huge fan of R, it's wealth of statistical packages available on and outside CRAN, and the community around it.
With the help of RStudio, and excellent scientific development environment, with strengths in many fields, but R Spatial is an especially exciting space to watch.
The language is quirkier than others, because of it's history and backward compatibility, but the Tidyverse brings in some abstraction and consistency that might make it easier for newcomers to use R.
Fast, secure, high-throughput and just amazing
Es un software muy útil para la programación, la estadística y el manejo de bases de datos, este programa también ayuda mucho en la creación de artículos científicos
Es una buena herramienta para los programadores o desarrolladores de software-
Un lenguaje de programación orientado a la estadística y el manejo de los datos. Si se le dedica tiempo prácticamente sustituye a cualquier otro software estadístico.
When the version 4.0 will be available here?
c"est bien pour les mathématiciens
